title: SOFA score calculation
text: Asuming data loaded dataframe df, SOFA score can calculated two different ways.

title: SOFA score calculation
text: Use sofa_magic_wrapper() function use raw data file Acutelines database. SOFA related variables coded SOFA_[timespan]h_[variable]. Make sure variables present. interval can used set time stap interval correspondance dataset, timespan can use set maximum timespan.

title: SOFA score calculation
text: dataset different naming schema (SOFA_[timespan]h_[variable] format), can still calculate SOFA score package, however, provide package mapping column dataset corresponding acutal element SOFA score. First define mapping: pass mapping sofa_total function along dataframe:
code: column_mapping <- c(   PaO2 = "your_PaO2_variable",   SpO2 = "your_SpO2_variable",   FiO2 = "your_FiO2_variable",   oxygen_supply = "your_oxygen_supply_variable",   platelets = "your_platelets_variable",   bilirubin = "your_bilirubin_variable",   MAP = "your_MAP_variable",   dopamine = "your_dopamine_variable",   dobutamine = "your_dobutamine_variable",   epinephrine = "your_epinephrine_variable",   norepinephrine = "your_norepineprhine_variable",   norepinephrine_amp = "your_norepinephrine_amp_variable",   GCS = "your_GCS_variable",   creatinine = "your_creatinine_variable" ) result <- sofa_total(df, column_mapping)

title: SOFA score calculation
text: SOFA (Sequential Organ Failure Assessment) calculation functions designed provide worst SOFA score patient within specific interval. retrospectively calculating SOFA score, one must address missing values inaccurately recorded values. function automatically handles issues. Consequently, SOFA score functions incorporate several assumptions ensure feasible calculations. Users aware assumptions utilizing functions.

title: SOFA score calculation
text: Many respiratory parameters tend missing. sofa_respiration() function calculated respiratory points SOFA score following rules assumptions: PaO2 7 assumed venous removed dataset. PaO2 missing, imputed SpO2 using Brows / Ellis equation [3][4]. Rounded 1 decimal. FiO2 missing imputed nasal canula oxygen supply (L/min). case nasal canula oxygen supply 16 L/min assumed FiO2.

title: SOFA score calculation
text: Lambden, S., Laterre, P.F., Levy, M.M. et al. SOFA score—development, utility challenges accurate assessment clinical trials. Crit Care 23, 374 (2019). https://doi.org/10.1186/s13054-019-2663-7 Moreno, R., Rhodes, ., Piquilloud, L. et al. Sequential Organ Failure Assessment (SOFA) Score: time come update?. Crit Care 27, 15 (2023). https://doi.org/10.1186/s13054-022-04290-9 DOI: 10.1016/j.chest.2016.01.003 DOI: 0.1152/jappl.1979.46.3.599

title: Toolbox to work with Acutelines biobak data.
text: package can used work data extracted Acutelines data- biobank. provides tools parse data extracts perform calculations uniform matter. Acutelines multi-disciplinary prospective hospital-based cohort study examining 24/7 complete acute patient journey admitted ED University Medical Centre Groningen (UMCG), tertiary care teaching hospital Netherlands. employs broad range investigative procedures assessing pre-hospital, -hospital, long-term health factors affect outcome patients acute conditions. cohort population broadly representative people living Northern Netherlands acute medical conditions. Detailed information cohort participant selection can found elsewhere [1] [2]. Participants asked written informed consent, applicable proxy. Acutelines cohort study approved medical ethics committee UMCG, Netherlands registered trial registration number NCT04615065 ClinicalTrials.gov [3]. www.acutelines.nl ter Avest E, van Munster BC, van Wijk RJ, et al Cohort profile Acutelines: large data/biobank acute emergency medicine. BMJ Open 2021;11:e047349. doi: 10.1136/bmjopen-2020-047349 https://clinicaltrials.gov/study/NCT04615065

title: SOFA magic wrapper — sofa_magic_wrapper

title: SOFA magic wrapper — sofa_magic_wrapper

code: if (FALSE) { column_mapping <- c(  PaO2 = "SOFA_24h_PaO2",  SpO2 = "SOFA_24h_SpO2",  FiO2 = "SOFA_24h_FiO2",  oxygen_supply = "SOFA_24h_oxygen_supply",  platelets = "SOFA_24h_platelets",  bilirubin = "SOFA_24h_bilirubin",  MAP = "SOFA_24h_MAP",  dopamine = "SOFA_24h_dopamine",  dobutamine = "SOFA_24h_dobutamine",  epinephrine = "SOFA_24h_epinephrine",  norepinephrine = "SOFA_24h_norepineprhine",  norepinephrine_amp = "SOFA_24h_norepinephrine_amp",  GCS = "SOFA_24h_GCS",  creatinine = "SOFA_24h_creatinine"  ) result <- sofa_total(df, column_mapping) }
